00017 #include "MisrCoordQuery.h"
00018 #include "MisrError.h"
00019 #include "misrproj.h"
00020 
00039 MTKt_status MtkSomXYToBlsAry(
00040   int path,              
00041   int resolution_meters, 
00042   int nelement,          
00043   const double *som_x,   
00044   const double *som_y,   
00045   int *block,            
00046   float *line,           
00047   float *sample           )
00048 {
00049   MTKt_status status_code;      /* Return status of this function */
00050   MTKt_status status;       /* Return status */
00051   MTKt_MisrProjParam pp;    /* Projection parameters */
00052   int i;            /* Loop index */
00053 
00054   if (som_x == NULL || som_y == NULL || block == NULL ||
00055       line == NULL || sample == NULL)
00056     MTK_ERR_CODE_JUMP(MTK_NULLPTR);
00057 
00058   if (nelement < 0)
00059     MTK_ERR_CODE_JUMP(MTK_BAD_ARGUMENT);
00060 
00061   status = MtkPathToProjParam(path, resolution_meters, &pp);
00062   MTK_ERR_COND_JUMP(status);
00063 
00064   status = misr_init(pp.nblock, pp.nline, pp.nsample,
00065              pp.reloffset, pp.ulc, pp.lrc);
00066   if (status != MTK_SUCCESS)
00067     MTK_ERR_CODE_JUMP(MTK_MISR_PROJ_INIT_FAILED);
00068 
00069   for (i = 0; i < nelement; i++) {
00070     status = misrfor(som_x[i], som_y[i], &block[i], &line[i], &sample[i]);
00071     if (status != MTK_SUCCESS)
00072       MTK_ERR_CODE_JUMP(MTK_MISR_FORWARD_PROJ_FAILED);
00073   }
00074 
00075   return MTK_SUCCESS;
00076 
00077 ERROR_HANDLE:
00078   return status_code;
00079 }
